channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WC Sales Notification
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WC Sales Notification

item.title: CVE-2023-1087|2024-08-02T05:32:46.373Z -- unknown -- wc%20sales%20notification
item.description: The WC Sales Notification WordPress plugin before 1.2.3 does not have CSRF check when activating plugins, which could allow attackers to make logged in admins activate arbitrary plugins present on the blog via a CSRF attack
